            class AchievementsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :set_achievement, only: %i[ show edit update destroy ]
          
      3.

              def new

    15. 
            

            

                @achievement = Achievement.new
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @target_type = params[:target_type] || 'Team'
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18.

              def edit

    21. 
            

            

                @target_type = @achievement.target_type

    22. 
            

            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23.

              # POST /achievements or /achievements.json
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              def create
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                @achievement = Achievement.new(achievement_params)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                quest_id = params[:achievement][:quest_id]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  if @achievement.save
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    # Create a highlight if a quest was selected
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    if quest_id.present?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      quest = Quest.find(quest_id)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      @achievement.add_to_quest(quest)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    format.html { redirect_to @achievement, notice: "Achievement was successfully created." }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    format.json { render :show, status: :created, location: @achievement }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  else
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    @target_type = @achievement.target_type || params[:achievement][:target_type] || 'Team'
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    format.html { render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    format.json { render json: @achievement.errors, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46.

              # PATCH/PUT /achievements/1 or /achievements/1.json
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              def update
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  if @achievement.update(achievement_params)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    format.html { redirect_to @achievement, notice: "Achievement was successfully updated." }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    format.json { render :show, status: :ok, location: @achievement }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    format.html { render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    format.json { render json: @achievement.errors, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              # DELETE /achievements/1 or /achievements/1.json
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                @achievement.destroy!
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  format.html { redirect_to achievements_path, status: :see_other, notice: "Achievement was successfully destroyed." }
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  format.json { head :no_content }
          
      67.

              def target_options
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                model = params[:type].safe_constantize

    73. 
            

            

                if model && model.respond_to?(:all)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74.

    app/controllers/concerns/filter_loader.rb

            module FilterLoader
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              extend ActiveSupport::Concern
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Load current filters from params based on filterable associations
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Sets instance variables for each filter and returns a hash of filter objects
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def load_current_filters
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                result = {}
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                filterable_associations.each do |association|
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  param_key = "#{association}_id"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  next unless params[param_key].present?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Get the model class and load the object
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  model_class = association.to_s.singularize.classify.constantize
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  filter_object = model_class.find_by id: params[param_key]
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  if filter_object
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    # Set instance variable (e.g., @sport = Sport.find(...))
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    instance_variable_set "@#{association}", filter_object
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    result[association] = filter_object
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                @current_filters = result
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              # Load filter options for selectors
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              def load_filter_options
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                @filter_options = {}
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                filterable_associations.each do |association|
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  @filter_options[association] = association.to_s.classify.constantize.all
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                @filter_options
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              # Build a breadcrumb trail based on current filters and the viewed resource
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              # @param resource [ActiveRecord::Base] The current resource being viewed
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              # @param filters [Hash] Hash of current filters
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              # @return [Array] Array of breadcrumb items with labels and paths
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              def build_filtered_breadcrumb(resource, filters = {})
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                return [] if filters.empty? && !resource
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                breadcrumbs = []
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                resource_name = resource.class.name.underscore
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                resource_type = resource_name.pluralize.to_sym
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Add each filter to the breadcrumb trail
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                if filters.any?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  # Sort filters to ensure consistent order
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  sorted_filters = sort_filters_by_hierarchy filters
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  filter_chain = {}
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  sorted_filters.each do |filter_key, filter_obj|
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    filter_chain[filter_key] = filter_obj
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    # Build the path with filters up to this point
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    path = filtered_path filter_key.to_s.pluralize.to_sym, filter_chain
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    # Add to breadcrumbs
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    breadcrumbs << {
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      label: filter_obj.name,
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      path: path,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      type: filter_key.to_s.humanize
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    }
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                # Add the current resource as the final breadcrumb
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                resource_path = if filters.any?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  filtered_path [resource_type, resource.id], filters
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                else
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  # Regular non-filtered path
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  send "#{resource_name}_path", resource
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                breadcrumbs << {
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  label: resource.name,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  path: resource_path,
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  type: resource_name.humanize,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  current: true
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                }
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                breadcrumbs
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              private
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              # Sort filters by a predefined hierarchy
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              # This ensures we present filters in a logical order (e.g., sport -> league -> team)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              def sort_filters_by_hierarchy(filters)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                return [] if filters.empty?
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                # Define the hierarchy of resources
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                hierarchy = [
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  :sport,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  :league,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  :conference,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  :division,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  :team,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  :country,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  :state,
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  :city,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  :stadium,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  :player
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                ]
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                # Convert filters to array and sort by hierarchy position
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                filters.to_a.sort do |(key_a, _), (key_b, _)|
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  pos_a = hierarchy.index(key_a.to_sym) || 999
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  pos_b = hierarchy.index(key_b.to_sym) || 999
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  pos_a <=> pos_b
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            end
          
      116.

    app/controllers/concerns/filterable.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    88 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 88 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            module Filterable
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              extend ActiveSupport::Concern
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              class_methods do
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def filterable_by(*associations)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  @filterable_associations = associations
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # Apply ONE filter based on params and return the filtered collection
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # This method sets aninstance variable for the scope (e.g., @sport, @team)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def apply_filter result
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                scope = nil
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                filterable_associations.select do |association|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  params[association.to_s.foreign_key].present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                end.each do |association|
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  scope = instance_variable_set("@#{association}", association.to_s.classify.constantize.find(params[association.to_s.foreign_key]))
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if scope.nil?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  result.to_s.classify.constantize.all
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                else
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  scope.send result
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              # Apply multiple filters to a relation
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              # This version supports applying multiple filters simultaneously
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              # and uses optimal join paths for complex associations
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              def apply_filters(relation)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                return relation if filterable_associations.empty?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                applied_filters = {}
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Collect all filters to apply
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                filterable_associations.each do |association|
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  param_key = "#{association}_id"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  next unless params[param_key].present?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  applied_filters[association] = params[param_key]
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # Return unchanged relation if no filters applied
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                return relation if applied_filters.empty?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                # Apply each filter with the appropriate join strategy
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                applied_filters.each do |association, filter_value|
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  # Use custom join paths if defined in FilterableAssociations
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  model_name = controller_name.singularize.to_sym
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  join_path = FilterableAssociations.join_path_for model_name, association
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  if join_path
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    # Apply complex joins
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    relation = relation.joins(*join_path)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    # The last join in the path determines the final association to filter on
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    target_association = join_path.last
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    relation = relation.where target_association => { id: filter_value }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  else
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    # Simple direct association
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    relation = relation.joins(association).where association => { id: filter_value }
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                relation
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              # Build a filtered query based on the result type and applied filters
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              # This is a more flexible approach than the original apply_filter method
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              # that allows for multiple filters to be applied at once
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              #
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              # @param result [Symbol, String] The result collection name (e.g., :players)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              # @param filters [Hash] Hash of filter objects (e.g., { sport: @sport, team: @team })
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveRecord::Relation] The filtered query
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              def build_filtered_query(result, filters)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                # Convert result to a class if it's a symbol or string
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                result_class = result.is_a?(Class) ? result : result.to_s.singularize.classify.constantize
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # Start with a base query
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                query = result_class.all
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                # Apply each filter with the best join strategy
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                filters.each do |association, filter_object|
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  # Skip nil filters
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  next unless filter_object
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  # Get the model name for finding join paths
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  model_name = controller_name.singularize.to_sym
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  # Try to find a join path for this association
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  join_path = FilterableAssociations.join_path_for model_name, association
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  if join_path
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    # Apply complex joins if a join path is defined
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    query = query.joins(*join_path)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    # The 'association' variable (e.g., :conference) determines the target table for the WHERE clause
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    target_table_for_where = association.to_s.pluralize.to_sym
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    query = query.where(target_table_for_where => { id: filter_object.id })
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  else
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    # Try different approaches based on the associations
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    if result_class.reflect_on_association(association)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      # Direct belongs_to association
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      query = query.where association => filter_object
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    elsif filter_object.respond_to?(result.to_s.pluralize)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      # Has_many association from the filter object
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      # Let the filter object scope the query
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      query = filter_object.send(result.to_s.pluralize)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    else
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      # Try a join approach as a fallback
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                        query = query.joins(association).where association => { id: filter_object.id }
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      rescue ActiveRecord::ConfigurationError => e
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                        # If joining fails, try to find a different association path
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "Filter join error: #{e.message}. Trying alternative approach."
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                        # As a last resort, just return all records that match the filter ID
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                        query = query.where "#{association}_id" => filter_object.id
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                query
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              # Helper method to build filtered paths for links
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              def filtered_path(base_path, options = {})
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                path = base_path
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                filterable_associations.each do |association|
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  param_key = "#{association}_id"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  if params[param_key].present? || options[association]
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    value = options[association] || params[param_key]
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    path = "#{association.to_s.pluralize}/#{value}/#{path}"
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                path
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              private
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              def filterable_associations
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                # First check if controller has explicitly set associations
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                explicit_associations = self.class.instance_variable_get(:@filterable_associations)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                return explicit_associations if explicit_associations.present?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                # Otherwise use the configuration file
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                FilterableAssociations.for(self.class.name)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148.

            class ContractsController < ApplicationController
          
      2.

    3.

    4.

    5.

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Load current filters and set related instance variables
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @current_filters = load_current_filters
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Build the base query using the filters
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                base_query = apply_filter :contracts
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Add includes for efficient queries
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                base_query = base_query.includes(:player, :team, :activations, 
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                                               player: :team, 
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                                               team: [:league, league: :sport])
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # Apply ordering - contracts sorted by start date descending by default
          
      19.

              def setup_game
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                difficulty = params[:difficulty]&.to_sym || :conference
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                difficulty = :conference unless [:conference, :league].include?(difficulty)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                num_choices = params[:num_choices]&.to_i || 4
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                num_choices = 4 if num_choices < 2 || num_choices > 8
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                service = DivisionGameSetupService.new(difficulty: difficulty, num_choices: num_choices)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                game_data = service.call
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                if game_data.nil? || game_data.team.nil? || game_data.correct_division.nil? || game_data.choices.blank? || game_data.choices.length < MINIMUM_VIABLE_GAME_CHOICES
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  flash[:alert] = "Could not set up a new game. Please try a different difficulty or ensure your database has sufficient data."
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  redirect_to new_division_game_path 
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  return
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                @team = game_data.team
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @correct_division = game_data.correct_division
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                @choices = game_data.choices
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                @sport = game_data.sport
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                session[:division_game_team_id] = @team.id
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                session[:division_game_correct_division_id] = @correct_division.id
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                session[:division_game_difficulty] = difficulty.to_s
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                session[:division_game_choice_ids] = @choices.map(&:id)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                session[:division_game_start_time] = Time.current.to_f
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            end
          
      60.

            class DivisionsController < ApplicationController

              def index

                @divisions = apply_filter :divisions

                @spectrums = Spectrum.all

            class GameAttemptsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Assuming you use Devise and have a helper like `authenticate_ace!`
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_ace!
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5.

              # GET /game_attempts
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # GET /game_attempts.json
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # Filter by game_type if provided
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                scope = current_ace.game_attempts
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                scope = scope.where(game_type: params[:game_type]) if params[:game_type].present?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Limit results
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                limit = params[:limit].present? ? params[:limit].to_i : 10
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                limit = [limit, 50].min # Cap at 50 for performance
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @game_attempts = scope.order(created_at: :desc).limit(limit)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  format.html # index.html.erb
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  format.json do
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    render json: @game_attempts.as_json(include: {
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      subject_entity: { methods: [:logo_url, :name] },
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      target_entity: { methods: [:logo_url, :name] },
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24.

      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25.

      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

              # POST /game_attempts
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              def create
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                @game_attempt = current_ace.game_attempts.build(game_attempt_params)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                if @game_attempt.save

    35. 
            

            

                  # Return the saved attempt as JSON with associated entities
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  render json: @game_attempt.as_json(include: {
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    subject_entity: { methods: [:logo_url, :name] },
          
      38.

      39.

                    chosen_entity: { methods: [:logo_url, :name] }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  }), status: :created
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                else
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  # Log errors for debugging
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to save GameAttempt: #{@game_attempt.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  render json: { errors: @game_attempt.errors.full_messages }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47.

      24.

              def destroy

                if params[:achievement_id].present?

      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  @available_quests = Quest.where.not(id: @achievement.quest_ids)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  render :new_from_achievement
          
      23.

            class LeaguesController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              include Filterable
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              include FilterLoader
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_league, only: %i[ show ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @leagues = apply_filter :leagues
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                load_current_filters
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                load_filter_options
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @leagues = @leagues.includes(:sport, :country).order(:name)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              def show
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                load_current_filters
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @teams = @league.teams.includes(:stadium).order(:name)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                load_filter_options
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17.

            class PlayersController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              include Filterable
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              include FilterLoader
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_player, only: %i[ show edit update destroy ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Load current filters and set related instance variables
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @current_filters = load_current_filters
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Build the base query using the filters  
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                base_query = apply_filter :players
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Simplified query - add joins only for columns we're actually sorting by
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                base_query = base_query.includes(:team, team: [:league, league: :sport])
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                                      .includes(:positions)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                # Initialize hierarchical sorting
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                @sort_service = HierarchicalSortService.from_params(params)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Apply hierarchical sorting (including integrated random)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                sql_order = @sort_service.to_sql_order
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                if sql_order
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # Use custom SQL ORDER BY clause that handles random within hierarchy
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  # Remove distinct since we're not searching and it conflicts with custom ORDER BY
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  @players = base_query.order(Arel.sql(sql_order))
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  # No sorts specified, use default
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  @players = base_query.order(:first_name)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Load available spectrums for the rating selector
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                @spectrums = Spectrum.all
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Set current spectrum ID if provided in params
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                set_current_spectrum_id params[:spectrum_id] if params[:spectrum_id].present?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # Load filter options for selector UI
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                @filter_options = load_filter_options
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                # Paginate the results
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                @pagy, @players = pagy(@players, items: params[:per_page] || 20)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              # GET /players/1 or /players/1.json
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              def show
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                # Load any filters that were applied when navigating to this show page
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                load_current_filters
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Load related ratings
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                @ratings = @player.ratings.includes(:ace)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                @player_ratings = @player.ratings.includes(:ace).order(created_at: :desc).limit(10)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                @team_ratings = @player.team.ratings.includes(:ace).order(created_at: :desc).limit(10) if @player.team
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                # Set up filter options for navigation to related resources
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                load_filter_options
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # Create a filtered breadcrumb for this player
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

              # GET /quests/random

              def random
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                # Find quests the current ace hasn't started yet
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                current_ace_quest_ids = current_ace.goals.pluck(:quest_id)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                available_quests = Quest.where.not(id: current_ace_quest_ids)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                if available_quests.any?
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  # Get a random quest
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  @quest = available_quests.order("RANDOM()").first
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  @random_mode = true
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  render :show
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                else
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  # If the ace has started all quests, just show a random one
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  @quest = Quest.order("RANDOM()").first
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  @random_mode = true
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  if @quest
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    render :show
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  else
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    redirect_to quests_path, alert: "No quests available."
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85.
