            class RatingsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              before_action :authenticate_ace!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              before_action :set_rating, only: [:show, :edit, :update, :destroy]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_target, only: [:new, :create, :for_spectrums]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              before_action :authorize_rating, only: [:edit, :update, :destroy]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # GET /ratings
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def index
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @ratings = if params[:spectrum_id].present?
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  Spectrum.find(params[:spectrum_id]).ratings.active.includes(:target).order(created_at: :desc)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                else
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  current_ace.ratings.active.includes(:spectrum, :target).order(created_at: :desc)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # GET /ratings/1
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              def show
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              # GET /ratings/new
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              # GET /players/1/ratings/new
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              # GET /teams/1/ratings/new
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              def new
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # Find existing rating or initialize a new one
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                @spectrum_id = params[:spectrum_id]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                if @spectrum_id.present?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  @spectrum = Spectrum.find(@spectrum_id)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  @rating = current_ace.ratings.active.find_or_initialize_by(target: @target, spectrum: @spectrum)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                else
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  @rating = Rating.new(target: @target)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  @spectrums = Spectrum.all
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              # GET /ratings/1/edit
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              def edit
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                @spectrum = @rating.spectrum
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              # POST /ratings
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              # POST /players/1/ratings
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              # POST /teams/1/ratings
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              def create
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                Rating.transaction do
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  # Archive existing active rating if present
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  existing = current_ace.ratings.find_by(
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    spectrum_id: rating_params[:spectrum_id],
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    target_type: rating_params[:target_type],
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    target_id: rating_params[:target_id],
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    archived: false
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  )
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  existing&.update!(archived: true) if existing
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # Create new rating
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  @rating = current_ace.ratings.create!(rating_params)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  format.html { redirect_to after_rating_path }
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  format.json { render json: { success: true, rating: @rating }, status: :created }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  format.js { head :ok }
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Rating creation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  format.html do
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    @spectrum = Spectrum.find(rating_params[:spectrum_id]) if rating_params[:spectrum_id]
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    @spectrums = @spectrum ? [@spectrum] : Spectrum.all
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    @rating ||= Rating.new(rating_params)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    @rating.errors.add(:base, e.message)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  format.json { render json: { success: false, errors: [e.message] }, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  format.js { head :unprocessable_entity }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              # PATCH/PUT /ratings/1
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              def update
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                Rating.transaction do
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  # Archive existing active rating if present
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  existing = current_ace.ratings.find_by(
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    spectrum_id: rating_params[:spectrum_id],
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    target_type: rating_params[:target_type],
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    target_id: rating_params[:target_id],
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    archived: false
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  )
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  existing&.update!(archived: true) if existing
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  # Create new rating
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  @rating = current_ace.ratings.create!(rating_params)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                redirect_to after_rating_path
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Rating update failed: #{e.message}"
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                @spectrum = Spectrum.find(rating_params[:spectrum_id]) if rating_params[:spectrum_id]
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                @rating ||= Rating.new(rating_params)
          
      100.

      102.

              end
          
      103.

              # DELETE /ratings/1

              def destroy

    106. 
            

            

                @rating.destroy

    107. 
            

            

                redirect_to ratings_url, notice: 'Rating was successfully removed.'
          
      108.

      109.

              # GET /players/1/ratings/for_spectrums
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              # GET /teams/1/ratings/for_spectrums
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              # Returns existing ratings for the current ace and target for the given spectrum IDs
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              def for_spectrums
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                spectrum_ids = params[:spectrum_ids].presence || []
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                spectrum_ids = spectrum_ids.split(',') if spectrum_ids.is_a?(String)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                spectrum_ids = spectrum_ids.map(&:to_i).reject(&:zero?)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                if spectrum_ids.empty?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  render json: { ratings: {} }
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  return
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                # Find existing ratings for this ace, target, and spectrums
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                ratings = current_ace.ratings.active
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                                     .where(target: @target)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                                     .where(spectrum_id: spectrum_ids)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                                     .includes(:spectrum)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                # Build response hash with spectrum_id as key and rating data as value
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                ratings_hash = {}
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                ratings.each do |rating|
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  ratings_hash[rating.spectrum_id] = {
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    id: rating.id,
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    value: rating.value,
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    spectrum_id: rating.spectrum_id,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    spectrum_name: rating.spectrum.name
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  }
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  format.json { render json: { ratings: ratings_hash } }
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              private
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                # Use callbacks to share common setup or constraints between actions.
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                def set_rating
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  @rating = Rating.find(params[:id])
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                # Set the target for the rating based on the ratable_models configuration
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                def set_target
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  # Look for any valid target ID parameter
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  target_param = find_target_param
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  if target_param
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    model_name, id = target_param
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    model_class = model_name.classify.constantize
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    @target = model_class.find(id)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    @target_type = model_name.singularize
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  else
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    # No valid target type found
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    redirect_to root_path, alert: 'Invalid target for rating.'
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                # Find the first valid target parameter in the request
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                def find_target_param
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  Rails.application.config.ratable_models.each do |model_name|
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    param_name = "#{model_name.underscore}_id"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    return [model_name.underscore, params[param_name]] if params[param_name].present?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                # Only allow a list of trusted parameters through.
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                def rating_params
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  params.require(:rating).permit(:spectrum_id, :value, :notes, :target_id, :target_type)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                # Ensure the current ace can only modify their own ratings
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                def authorize_rating
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  unless @rating.ace == current_ace
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    redirect_to ratings_path, alert: "You can only modify your own ratings."
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                # Determine where to redirect after rating based on target type
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                def after_rating_path
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  if @target && @target_type && Rails.application.config.ratable_models_hash[@target_type.classify]
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    # Dynamically generate the path helper name and call it
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    send("#{@target_type}_path", @target)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  else
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    ratings_path
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            end
          
      198.

                # Use callbacks to share common setup or constraints between actions.

                # Only allow a list of trusted parameters through.
          
      57.

                def spectrum_params
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58.

                  # This is a placeholder for admin authentication

    104.

      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  else
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    teams_pool = @parent.teams.to_a
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  return redirect_back(fallback_location: root_path, alert: "No teams found in this scope.") if teams_pool.empty?
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  # Important: Restrict to ONLY these teams
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  filter_params[:team_ids] = teams_pool.map(&:id)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "TEAM MATCH: Restricting to teams: #{filter_params[:team_ids]}"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                elsif ace_signed_in? && no_scope_specified? &&
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      filter_params[:team_id].blank? && filter_params[:sport_id].blank? && filter_params[:league_id].blank?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  # No scope specified, use quest teams for logged-in users
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120.

      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  unless quest_teams.empty?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    cross_sport = params[:cross_sport] == 'true'
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    teams_pool  = cross_sport ? quest_teams : quest_teams.select { |t| t.sport.id == quest_teams.first.sport.id }
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    filter_params[:team_ids] = teams_pool.map(&:id) if teams_pool.present?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "TEAM MATCH: Using quest teams: #{filter_params[:team_ids]}"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                # Fetch players based on the filters
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130.

    131. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "TEAM MATCH: Found #{players.size} players with filter params: #{filter_params}"
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                if players.empty?
