              # Renders a collection of records with their names and logos
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              # 
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              # @param collection [ActiveRecord::Relation] A collection of ActiveRecord objects
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Additional options for customization
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              # @option options [String] :title Custom title for the collection (defaults to humanized collection name)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              # @option options [Boolean] :link_to_collection Whether to link to the collection (default: false)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              # @option options [ActiveRecord::Base] :parent Parent record for nested routes
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              # @option options [String] :css_class CSS class for the collection container (defaults to collection name)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              # @option options [String] :item_css_class CSS class for each item in the collection (defaults to singularized collection name)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              # @option options [Symbol] :logo_attribute The attribute to use for the logo URL (defaults to :logo_url)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveSupport::SafeBuffer] HTML for the collection
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              def render_collection(collection, **options)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                return content_tag(:div, "No items", class: "empty-collection") if collection.empty? && !options[:show_empty]
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                # Determine collection name and CSS classes
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                collection_name = collection.model_name.plural
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                item_name = collection.model_name.singular
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                # Set up options with defaults
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                title = options.fetch(:title, collection.model_name.human.pluralize)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                link_to_collection = options.fetch(:link_to_collection, false)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                parent = options.fetch(:parent, nil)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                css_class = options.fetch(:css_class, collection_name)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                item_css_class = options.fetch(:item_css_class, item_name)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                logo_attribute = options.fetch(:logo_attribute, :logo_url)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                content_tag :div, class: css_class do
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  # Display the count/title, optionally as a link
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  concat(
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    if link_to_collection && parent
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      link_to pluralize(collection.count, title), [parent, collection_name.to_sym]
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    else
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      pluralize(collection.count, title)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  )
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  # Display each item in the collection
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  collection.each do |item|
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    concat(
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      content_tag(:div, id: dom_id(item), class: item_css_class) do
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                        display_name_with_lazy_logo(item, logo_attribute: logo_attribute)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    )
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

              
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              # For backward compatibility - uses the generic render_collection helper
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              def render_teams_collection(teams, **options)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                render_collection(teams, **options)

    104.

      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105.

    106. 
            

            

              # For backward compatibility - uses the generic render_collection helper
          
      107.

              def render_players_collection(players, **options)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                # Remove sport_name from options as it's no longer needed
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                options.delete(:sport_name)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                render_collection(players, **options)

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              # Displays a record's name with a placeholder for a lazy-loaded logo.
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              # The Stimulus 'lazy-logo_controller.js' will handle loading the actual image.
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              #
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              # @param record [ActiveRecord::Base] The record object (e.g., Team, Player).
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              # @param name_attribute [Symbol] The attribute on the record for its name (defaults to :name).
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              # @param logo_attribute [Symbol] The attribute for the logo URL (defaults to :logo_url).
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Additional HTML options for the container span.
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveSupport::SafeBuffer] HTML string for the container with name and logo placeholder.
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

              def display_name_with_lazy_logo(record, name_attribute: :name, logo_attribute: :logo_url, **options)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                return '' unless record
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                logo_url_value = record.respond_to?(logo_attribute) ? record.public_send(logo_attribute) : nil
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                entity_name = record.respond_to?(name_attribute) ? record.public_send(name_attribute) : "N/A"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                default_options = {
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  class: "lazy-logo-container", # Keep semantic class name
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  data: {
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    controller: "lazy-logo",
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    lazy_logo_entity_id_value: record.id,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    lazy_logo_entity_type_value: record.class.name.underscore, # Use underscore for consistency if fetching via API later
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    lazy_logo_url_value: logo_url_value
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                }
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                merged_options = default_options.deep_merge(options)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                content_tag(:span, **merged_options) do
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  # Placeholder for the image (Stimulus target)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  # Pre-styling for consistent size before image loads to reduce layout shift
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  logo_placeholder = content_tag(:span, "", class: "logo-placeholder", data: { lazy_logo_target: "image" })
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  # Name (Stimulus target, though not strictly necessary if only displaying name)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  name_span = content_tag(:span, entity_name, data: { lazy_logo_target: "name" })
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  unless options[:link] == false
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    name_span = link_to name_span, record
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  logo_placeholder + name_span
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Error in display_name_with_lazy_logo for record #{record&.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                entity_name || "Error"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            end
          
      157.

            module ContestsHelper

              def contest_display_name(contest)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                contest.name.presence || "Contest ##{contest.id}"
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              end
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def contests_index_page
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "contests-index-page" do
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  tag.header(class: "page-header") do
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    tag.h1("Contests", class: "page-title")
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  tag.main(class: "contests-grid") do
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    @contests.map { |contest| contest_item(contest) }.join.html_safe
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  (pagy_nav(@pagy) if @pagy.pages > 1).to_s.html_safe
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17.

      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              def contest_item(contest)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                tag.article class: "contest-item" do
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  tag.header(class: "contest-header") do
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    link_to(contest, class: "contest-link") do
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      tag.h3(contest_display_name(contest), class: "contest-name")
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "contest-details") do
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    if contest.description.present?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      tag.div(class: "contest-description") do
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                        truncate(contest.description, length: 100)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    end.to_s.html_safe +
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    if contest.begin_date || contest.end_date
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      tag.div(class: "contest-dates") do
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        date_text = ""
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                        if contest.begin_date
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                          date_text = "From: #{contest.begin_date.strftime('%b %d, %Y')}"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                        end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                        if contest.end_date
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                          date_text += " to #{contest.end_date.strftime('%b %d, %Y')}"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                        end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                        date_text
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    end.to_s.html_safe
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44.

      45.

              def contest_dates_section(contest)

      104.

              def contest_comments_section(contest)

              def contest_details_section(contest)
          
      135.

                tag.div class: "details-section" do
          
      136.

      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "details-content") do
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    tag.pre(JSON.pretty_generate(contest.details), class: "details-json")
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  end
          
      140.

                end

              def contest_contestants_section(contest)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "contestants-section" do
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  tag.h3("Contestants", class: "contestants-title") +
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  if contest.final_standings.any?
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    contest_standings_table(contest)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  else
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    contest_participants_list(contest)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              def contest_standings_table(contest)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                tag.table(class: "standings-table") do
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  tag.thead do
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    tag.tr do
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      tag.th("Place") +
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      tag.th("Team") +
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                      tag.th("Wins") +
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      tag.th("Losses") +
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      tag.th("Record")
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  tag.tbody do
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    contest.final_standings.map do |contestant|
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                      tag.tr(class: contestant_row_class(contestant)) do
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                        tag.td(contestant.placing || "—") +
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        tag.td(contestant.campaign.team.mascot) +
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                        tag.td(contestant.wins || "—") +
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                        tag.td(contestant.losses || "—") +
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                        tag.td(contestant_record(contestant))
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                      end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    end.join.html_safe
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              def contest_participants_list(contest)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                tag.ul(class: "participants-list") do
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  contest.contestants.includes(campaign: :team).map do |contestant|
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    tag.li(contestant.campaign.team.mascot, class: "participant-item")
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  end.join.html_safe
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              def contestant_row_class(contestant)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                case contestant.placing
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                when 1
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  "winner"
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                when 2
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  "runner-up"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                else
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  "participant"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              def contestant_record(contestant)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                if contestant.wins && contestant.losses
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  "#{contestant.wins}-#{contestant.losses}"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                else
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  "—"
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

              end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            end
          
      206.

    app/helpers/contracts_helper.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    79 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 79 lines missed.

            module ContractsHelper
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Display contract name with player and team info
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def contract_name_display(contract)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "record-name" do
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  player_display = contract.player ? 
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                    display_name_with_lazy_logo(contract.player, name_attribute: :full_name, logo_attribute: :image_url) : 
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                    "Unknown Player"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  team_display = contract.team ? 
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    display_name_with_lazy_logo(contract.team) : 
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    "Unknown Team"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  player_display + " - " + team_display
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # Display contract metadata (league, sport, dates)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              def contract_metadata_display(contract)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "record-metadata" do
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  content = []
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  content << link_to_name(contract.team.league)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  content << " | "
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  content << display_name_with_lazy_logo(contract.team.sport, logo_attribute: :icon_url)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  if contract.start_date || contract.end_date
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    content << " | "
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    content << contract_date_range_display(contract)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  safe_join(content)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              # Display contract value tag if available
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              def contract_value_display(contract)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                if contract.total_dollar_value.present?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  tag.div number_to_currency(contract.total_dollar_value), class: "record-tag"
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              # Display contract date range
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              def contract_date_range_display(contract)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                start_date = contract.start_date&.strftime("%m/%d/%Y") || "Start TBD"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end_date = contract.end_date&.strftime("%m/%d/%Y") || "End TBD"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                "#{start_date} - #{end_date}"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              # Display contract details if available
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              def contract_details_display(contract)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                if contract.details.present?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  tag.div contract.details, class: "record-details"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              # Combine all contract info elements
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              def contract_info_display(contract)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                content = contract_name_display(contract) +
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                          contract_metadata_display(contract)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                value_display = contract_value_display(contract)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                content += value_display if value_display
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                details_display = contract_details_display(contract)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                content += details_display if details_display
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                content
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              # Display contract statistics
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              def contract_stats_display(contract)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "record-stats" do
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  stats_content = []
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  # Activations count
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  activations_count = contract.activations.count
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  if activations_count > 0
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    stats_content << tag.div(class: "record-stats-count") do
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      tag.span pluralize(activations_count, "activation"), class: "record-stats-count-value"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  # Campaigns through activations
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  campaigns_count = contract.campaigns.distinct.count
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  if campaigns_count > 0
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    stats_content << tag.div(class: "record-stats-count") do
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      tag.span pluralize(campaigns_count, "campaign"), class: "record-stats-count-value"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  # Contract duration if dates are available
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  if contract.start_date && contract.end_date
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    duration_days = (contract.end_date - contract.start_date).to_i
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    if duration_days > 0
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      stats_content << tag.div(class: "record-stats-detail") do
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                        "Duration: #{pluralize(duration_days, 'day')}"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  # Display empty state if no stats
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  if stats_content.empty?
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    stats_content << tag.div("No statistics available", class: "record-stats-empty")
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  safe_join(stats_content)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            end
          
      109.

              # Generate a complete filtered show header with breadcrumbs and resource metadata
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              #
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # @param resource [Object] The resource being displayed
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # @param filtered_breadcrumb [Array] Array of breadcrumb items
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Additional options for customizing the header
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for the filtered show header
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def filtered_show_header(resource, filtered_breadcrumb = nil, options = {})
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                options = {
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  container_class: 'show-header',
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  breadcrumb_class: 'breadcrumb',
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  metadata_class: 'metadata'
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                }.merge options
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                content_tag :div, class: options[:container_class] do
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  content = []
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  # Add the breadcrumb navigation if present
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  content << filtered_breadcrumb_nav(filtered_breadcrumb, options) if filtered_breadcrumb.present?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # Add the resource metadata section
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  content << resource_metadata(resource, options)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  safe_join content
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              # UNUSED
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              # Generate breadcrumb navigation for filtered show pages
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              #
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              # @param breadcrumbs [Array] Array of breadcrumb items with keys :label, :path, :type, :current
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Additional options for customizing the breadcrumbs
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for the breadcrumb navigation
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              def filtered_breadcrumb_nav(breadcrumbs, options = {})
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                return ''.html_safe unless breadcrumbs.present?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                options = {
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  nav_class: 'breadcrumb',
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  list_class: 'breadcrumb-list',
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  item_class: 'breadcrumb-item',
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  separator_class: 'breadcrumb-separator',
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  current_class: 'current',
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  link_class: 'breadcrumb-link',
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  type_class: 'breadcrumb-type'
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                }.merge options
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                content_tag :nav, class: options[:nav_class], aria: { label: 'Breadcrumb' } do
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  content_tag :ol, class: options[:list_class] do
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    safe_join breadcrumbs.each_with_index.map { |crumb, index|
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      content_tag :li, class: options[:item_class] do
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        item_content = []
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                        # Add separator for all but the first item
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                        if index > 0
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                          item_content << tag.span("/", class: options[:separator_class])
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                        end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                        
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                        # Add the breadcrumb link or text
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                        if crumb[:current]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                          item_content << tag.span(crumb[:label], class: options[:current_class])
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                        else
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                          item_content << link_to(crumb[:path], class: options[:link_class]) do
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                            link_content = []
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                            link_content << tag.span(crumb[:type], class: options[:type_class]) if crumb[:type].present?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                            link_content << crumb[:label]
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                            safe_join link_content
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                          end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                        end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                        safe_join item_content
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    }
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              # UNUSED
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              # Generate resource metadata display for the show header
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              #
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              # @param resource [Object] The resource being displayed
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Additional options for customizing the metadata
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for the resource metadata section
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def resource_metadata(resource, options = {})
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                return ''.html_safe unless resource.present?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                options = {
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  container_class: 'metadata',
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  title_class: 'title',
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  description_class: 'description'
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                }.merge options
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                content_tag :div, class: options[:container_class] do
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  metadata_content = []
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  # Add the resource title
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  metadata_content << content_tag(:h1, resource.name, class: options[:title_class])
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  # Add the resource description if available
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  if resource.respond_to?(:description) && resource.description.present?
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    metadata_content << content_tag(:p, resource.description, class: options[:description_class])
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  safe_join metadata_content
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            end

    app/helpers/game_helper.rb

    0.0% lines covered
