            module GameHelper
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Renders a standardized game container with a title
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def unified_game_container(game_type, options = {}, &block)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                title = options[:title] || (game_type == "team_match" ? "Who does this player play for?" : "Which division does this team belong to?")
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                tag.div(class: "game-container") do
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "game-header") do
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    tag.h2 title, class: "game-title"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  end + capture(&block)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # Renders a standardized progress display
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              def game_progress_display(correct_count = 0)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "game-progress" do
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "progress-text") do
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    "Correct: " + 
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    tag.span(correct_count.to_s, class: "progress-count", data: { game_target: "progressCounter" })
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "progress-controls") do
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    tag.button(type: "button", class: "pause-button", 
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                              data: { game_target: "pauseButton", action: "click->game#togglePause" }) do
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      tag.i("", class: "fas fa-pause pause-icon") +
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      tag.span("Pause", class: "pause-text", data: { game_target: "pauseButtonText" })
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              # Renders a grid of choices with appropriate data attributes
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              def game_choices_grid(choices, correct_answer, game_type, options = {})
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                columns = options[:columns] || (choices.size <= 3 ? choices.size : (choices.size >= 6 ? 3 : 2))
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                grid_classes = "choices-grid choices-grid-#{columns}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                tag.div class: grid_classes do
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  raw(choices.map { |choice| 
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    game_choice_item(choice, correct_answer, game_type) 
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  }.join)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              # Renders a single choice item button with appropriate data attributes
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              def game_choice_item(choice, correct_answer, game_type)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                is_correct = (choice.id == correct_answer.id)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                choice_classes = "choice-item"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                data_attrs = {
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  action: "click->game#checkAnswer",
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  game_target: "choiceItem"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                }
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                # Add game-specific data attributes
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                if game_type == "team_match"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  data_attrs[:guessable_id] = choice.id
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  data_attrs[:correct] = is_correct.to_s
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                else
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  data_attrs[:guessable_id] = choice.id
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  data_attrs[:correct] = is_correct.to_s
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                button_tag type: "button", class: choice_classes, data: data_attrs do
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  render_choice_content(choice, game_type)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              # Renders the content inside a choice button
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              def render_choice_content(choice, game_type)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                if game_type == "team_match"
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  entity_name_class = "team-name"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  entity_image_class = "team-logo"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                else
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  entity_name_class = "division-name"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  entity_image_class = "division-logo"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                content = ""
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # Image part
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                content += tag.div(class: "choice-image-container") do
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  if choice.logo_url.present?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    tag.img src: choice.logo_url, alt: "#{choice.name} Logo", class: "choice-image #{entity_image_class}"
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  else
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    tag.div(class: "choice-image-placeholder") do
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      tag.i(class: "fas fa-shield-alt choice-placeholder-icon")
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                # Name part
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                content += tag.div(choice.name, class: "choice-name #{entity_name_class}")
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                content.html_safe
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              # Renders the answer overlay that appears after selecting an answer
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              def game_correct_answer_overlay(game_type)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                # Use the clean answer overlay for all game types - focuses on reinforcing the correct answer
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                tag.div(class: "answer-overlay", data: { game_target: "answerOverlay" }) do
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  tag.div("", class: "answer-text", data: { game_target: "answerText" })
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              # Renders a subject card (player or team) with standardized styling
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              def game_subject_card(subject, game_type, additional_data = {})
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                data_attrs = { game_target: "subjectCardDisplay" }
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                # Add appropriate data attributes based on game type
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                if game_type == "team_match"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  # For team match, subject is a player and the answer is their team
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  data_attrs[:player_id] = subject.id
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  data_attrs[:guessable_id] = subject.team_id if subject.respond_to?(:team_id)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                else
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  # For division guess, subject is a team and answer is their division
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  data_attrs[:guessable_id] = subject.id #TODO: check this
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  data_attrs[:guessable_answer_id] = subject.division_id if subject.respond_to?(:division_id)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                data_attrs.merge!(additional_data)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                tag.div(class: "subject-card", data: data_attrs) do
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  # Question text based on game type
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  question = if game_type == "team_match"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    "Who does #{subject.full_name || subject.name} play for?"
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  else
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    "Which division do the #{subject.name} belong to?"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  tag.h3(question, class: "subject-question") +
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  # Card content based on subject type
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  if game_type == "team_match"
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    render_card_entity(subject, :player)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  else
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    render_card_entity(subject, :team) 
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              # UNUSED
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              # Unified method to render either a player or team card
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              def render_card_entity(entity, entity_type)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                image_url = entity_type == :player ? entity.photo_url : entity.logo_url
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                name = entity_type == :player ? (entity.full_name || entity.name) : entity.name
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                subtitle = entity_type == :player ? entity.primary_position&.name : ""
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                icon = entity_type == :player ? "user" : "shield-alt"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                image_class = entity_type == :player ? "entity-image-player" : "entity-image-team"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                # Image container
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                tag.div(class: "entity-image-container") do
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  if image_url.present?
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    tag.img(src: image_url, alt: name, class: "entity-image #{image_class}")
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  else
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    tag.div(class: "entity-image-placeholder") do
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                      tag.i(class: "fas fa-#{icon} entity-placeholder-icon #{entity_type == :player ? 'player-icon' : 'team-icon'}")
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                end +
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                # Entity name and subtitle
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                tag.h3(name, class: "entity-name") +
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                (subtitle.present? ? tag.div(subtitle, class: "entity-subtitle") : "")
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              # Renders a container for recent attempts
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              def game_attempts_container(game_type)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                tag.div(class: "attempts-container hidden", 
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                        data: { game_target: "attemptsContainer" }) do
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  tag.h3("Recent Attempts", class: "attempts-heading") +
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "attempts-grid", 
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                          data: { game_target: "attemptsGrid" }) do
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    # Content will be dynamically populated by the controller
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    ""
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              # Renders a standardized progress indicator with correct count and pause button
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              def game_progress_display(correct_count = 0)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                tag.div(class: "controls", data: { game_target: "controls" }) do
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  # Progress counter
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  tag.div(progress_counter(correct_count), class: "progress-indicator") +
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  # Pause button
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  tag.button(class: "pause-button-main",
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                            data: { game_target: "pauseButton", action: "click->game#togglePause" }) do
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                    tag.i(class: "fa-solid fa-pause pause-button-icon") +
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    tag.span("Pause", class: "pause-button-text", data: { game_target: "pauseButtonText" })
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              def progress_counter(correct_count = 0)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                count = tag.span(correct_count.to_s, id: "progress_counter", class: "progress-counter", 
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                data: { game_target: "progressCounter" })
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                tag.span("Progress: #{count} correct".html_safe, class: "progress-label")
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              # Creates the CSS classes for result status indicators
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              def attempt_result_classes(is_correct)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                if is_correct
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  {
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    card: "correct-attempt",
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    indicator: "correct-indicator",
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    icon: "fa-check correct-icon",
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    text: "Correct"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  }
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                else
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  {
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                    card: "incorrect-attempt",
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                    indicator: "incorrect-indicator",
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                    icon: "fa-xmark incorrect-icon",
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    text: "Incorrect"
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  }
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

              
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

              # Renders an individual recent attempt item
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

              def game_attempt_item(entity_name, result, game_type, additional_data = {})
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                classes = attempt_result_classes(result)
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                entity_type = game_type == "team_match" ? "Player" : "Team"
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                tag.div(class: "attempt-item #{classes[:card]}") do
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "attempt-content") do
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    tag.i(class: "fas #{classes[:icon]}") +
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                    tag.span(entity_name, class: "attempt-entity-name")
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "attempt-result #{classes[:indicator]}") do
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                    classes[:text]
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            end
          
      233.

              # Renders a goal status badge with icon and text
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # @param goal [Goal] The goal object
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # @param size [Symbol] Size variant (:small, :medium, :large)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for the status badge
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def goal_status_badge(goal, size: :medium)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                status_config = {
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  'not_started' => {
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    text: 'Not Started',
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    icon: 'fa-solid fa-circle-pause',
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    css_class: 'goal-status-badge goal-status-not-started'
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  },
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  'in_progress' => {
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    text: 'In Progress', 
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    icon: 'fa-solid fa-circle-play',
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    css_class: 'goal-status-badge goal-status-in-progress'
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  },
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  'completed' => {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    text: 'Completed',
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    icon: 'fa-solid fa-circle-check', 
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    css_class: 'goal-status-badge goal-status-completed'
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  }
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                }
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                config = status_config[goal.status]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                size_class = "goal-status-badge-#{size}"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                tag.span class: "#{config[:css_class]} #{size_class}" do
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  tag.i(class: "#{config[:icon]} goal-status-icon") + 
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  config[:text]
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              # Renders a progress bar for a goal
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              # @param goal [Goal] The goal object  
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              # @param show_percentage [Boolean] Whether to show percentage inside bar
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              # @param size [Symbol] Size variant (:small, :medium, :large)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for the progress bar
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              def goal_progress_bar(goal, show_percentage: true, size: :medium)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                size_class = "goal-progress-bar-#{size}"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "goal-progress-container" do
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  bar_content = tag.div class: "goal-progress-bar #{size_class}", 
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                                       style: "width: #{goal.percent_complete}%" do
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    if show_percentage && goal.percent_complete > 15
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                      tag.span "#{goal.percent_complete}%", class: "goal-progress-text"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "goal-progress-track") { bar_content } +
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  if show_percentage && goal.percent_complete <= 15
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    tag.div "#{goal.percent_complete}% complete", class: "goal-progress-external-text"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              # Renders goal action buttons
          
      58.

              # @param goal [Goal] The goal object
          
      59.

      60.

              # @return [String] HTML for action buttons
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              def goal_action_buttons(goal, layout: :horizontal)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                view_quest_button = link_to "View Quest", goal.quest, class: "goal-action-button goal-action-secondary"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                view_goal_button = link_to "View Goal", goal, class: "goal-action-button goal-action-primary"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                if goal.status != 'completed'
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  abandon_button = link_to goal_path(goal),
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  method: :delete,
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  class: "goal-action-button goal-action-danger", 
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  confirm: "Are you sure you want to abandon this quest?",
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  title: "Abandon Quest",
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  id: dom_id(goal, :abandon_button_for) do
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    tag.i class: "fa-solid fa-trash"
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "goal-actions goal-actions-#{layout}" do      
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  safe_join [view_quest_button, view_goal_button, abandon_button].compact
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80.

              # Renders a notice/alert message

              # @param message [String] The message text

      84.

              def goal_notice(message, type: :notice)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                return "" unless message.present?

              def goal_container(**options, &block)

              # Renders a goals group section for status-based grouping

              def goals_group_section(status, goals, &block)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "goals-group" do
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111.

      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112.

      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "goals-group-list", &block)

              # Renders goals collection with status grouping
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              def goals_collection_with_grouping(goals)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                if goals.any?
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  goals.group_by(&:status).map do |status, grouped_goals|
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    goals_group_section status, grouped_goals do
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                      grouped_goals.map { |goal| render goal }.join.html_safe
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  end.join.html_safe
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                else
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  goals_empty_state
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131.

    136.

      137.

                   tag.h3("No goals yet", class: "goals-empty-title") +
          
      138.

      139.

              def goal_detail_page(goal, notice: nil, &block)

    146. 
            

            

                  (goal_notice(notice) +
          
      147.

      148.

              # Renders goal status section for detail page
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              def goal_status_section(goal)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "goal-detail-card" do
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  (tag.div(class: "goal-detail-header") do
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                     (tag.h2("Goal Status", class: "goal-detail-title") +
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                      goal_status_badge(goal)).html_safe
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                   end +
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                   tag.div(class: "goal-detail-content") do
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                     tag.div do
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                       (tag.div(class: "goal-progress-stats") do
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                          (tag.span("Progress") +
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                           tag.span("#{goal.progress} / #{goal.quest.highlights.required.count} achievements", 
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                                   class: "goal-progress-stats-value")).html_safe
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                        end +
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        goal_progress_bar(goal)).html_safe
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                     end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                   end).html_safe
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174.

              # Renders quest description section

              # Renders abandon quest section if applicable
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              def abandon_quest_section(goal)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                return unless goal.status != 'completed'
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "goal-page-actions justify-end" do
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  link_to goal_path(goal),
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                          method: :delete,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                          class: "goal-action-button goal-action-danger",
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                          confirm: "Are you sure you want to abandon this quest? This action cannot be undone.",
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                          title: "Abandon Quest",
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                          id: dom_id(goal, :abandon_button_detail) do
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            (tag.i(class: "fa-solid fa-trash mr-2") + "Abandon Quest").html_safe
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                end
          
      197.

              end

              # Renders a goal card wrapper

              # @param goal [Goal] The goal object

              # @return [String] HTML for goal card
          
      203.

              def goal_card(goal, **options, &block)

    204. 
            

            

                default_options = {

    207.

    208.

      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                tag.div **merged_options, &block

    211.

              # Renders page header with title and actions

              def goal_page_header(title, subtitle: nil, &block)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "goal-page-header" do

      221.

                    content += tag.p(subtitle, class: "goal-page-subtitle") if subtitle.present?
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    content
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  if block_given?

      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  else
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                    header_content

      230.

              # Renders achievement item

              # @param highlight [Highlight] The highlight/achievement object

              # @param required [Boolean] Whether this achievement is required

    236. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for achievement item
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              def achievement_item(highlight, required: true)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                icon_class = required ? "fa-solid fa-star achievement-icon-required" : 
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                                       "fa-regular fa-star achievement-icon-optional"
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "achievement-item" do
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  (tag.div(class: "achievement-icon-container") do
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                     tag.i class: icon_class
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                   end +
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                   tag.div(class: "achievement-content") do
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                     (tag.h3(highlight.achievement.name, class: "achievement-name") +
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                      tag.p(highlight.achievement.description, class: "achievement-description")).html_safe
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                   end).html_safe
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

              end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              # Renders achievement list section
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

              # @param highlights [ActiveRecord::Relation] Collection of highlights
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

              # @param title [String] Section title
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

              # @param required [Boolean] Whether these are required achievements
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for achievements section
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              def achievements_section(highlights, title, required: true)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "achievements-section" do
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  (tag.h2(title, class: "achievements-section-title") +
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                   if highlights.any?
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                     tag.div(class: "achievements-list") do
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                       highlights.includes(:achievement).map do |highlight|
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                         achievement_item highlight, required: required
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                       end.join.html_safe
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                     end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                   else
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                     tag.p("No #{title.downcase} for this quest.", class: "achievements-empty")
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                   end).html_safe
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                end
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

              end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

            end
          
      272.
