      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              # Display the current hierarchical sort chain
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              # Shows sorts in order: first clicked at top, subsequent clicks refine beneath
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              def hierarchical_sort_display
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                return "" if @sort_service.sort_params.empty?
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "hierarchical-sort-display" do
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  tag.span("Sort order (first → refinements):", class: "sort-chain-label") +
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "sort-chain") do
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    @sort_service.sort_params.filter_map.with_index do |sort, index|
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      next if sort[:direction] == 'inactive'
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      tag.div(class: "sort-chain-item") do
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                        tag.span("#{index + 1}.", class: "sort-chain-priority") +
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                        tag.span(humanize_sort_attribute(sort[:attribute]), class: "sort-chain-attribute") +
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                        tag.span(humanize_sort_direction(sort[:direction], sort[:attribute]), class: "sort-chain-direction") +
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                        sort_direction_controls(sort[:attribute], sort[:direction])
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    end.join.html_safe
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              # Generate direct direction control links for an existing sort
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              def sort_direction_controls(attribute, current_direction)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                tag.div(class: "sort-direction-controls") do
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  if %w[random shuffle].include?(attribute.to_s)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    # Random/shuffle controls
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    random_classes = current_direction == 'random' ? 
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      'sort-direction-link sort-direction-active' : 
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      'sort-direction-link sort-direction-inactive'
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    shuffle_classes = current_direction == 'shuffle' ? 
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      'sort-direction-link sort-direction-active' : 
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      'sort-direction-link sort-direction-inactive'
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    random_link = direct_sort_link(attribute, 'random', '🎲', random_classes)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    shuffle_link = direct_sort_link(attribute, 'shuffle', '🔀', shuffle_classes)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    remove_link = direct_sort_link(attribute, 'inactive', '✕', 'sort-direction-link sort-direction-remove')
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    random_link + shuffle_link + remove_link
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  else
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    # Regular ascending/descending controls
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    asc_classes = current_direction == 'asc' ? 
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      'sort-direction-link sort-direction-active' : 
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      'sort-direction-link sort-direction-inactive'
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    asc_link = direct_sort_link(attribute, 'asc', '↑', asc_classes)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    desc_classes = current_direction == 'desc' ? 
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      'sort-direction-link sort-direction-active' : 
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                      'sort-direction-link sort-direction-inactive'
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    desc_link = direct_sort_link(attribute, 'desc', '↓', desc_classes)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    remove_link = direct_sort_link(attribute, 'inactive', '✕', 'sort-direction-link sort-direction-remove')
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    asc_link + desc_link + remove_link
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              # Create a direct sort link that sets a specific direction
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              def direct_sort_link(attribute, target_direction, icon, css_classes)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                # Create a new service with the specified direction for this attribute
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                new_service = create_service_with_direction(attribute, target_direction)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                sort_param = new_service.to_param
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                # Build URL parameters
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                url_params = request.query_parameters.except('sort')
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                url_params[:sort] = sort_param unless sort_param.empty?
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                link_to players_path(url_params), 
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                        class: css_classes, 
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                        data: { turbo_preload: false },
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                        title: "#{humanize_sort_attribute(attribute)} #{target_direction == 'inactive' ? 'remove' : target_direction}" do
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  tag.span(icon, class: "sort-direction-icon")
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              # Create a new service with a specific direction for an attribute
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              def create_service_with_direction(attribute, target_direction)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                new_params = @sort_service.sort_params.dup
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                existing_index = @sort_service.find_sort_index(attribute)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                if existing_index
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  if target_direction == 'inactive'
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    # Remove the sort entirely
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    new_params.delete_at(existing_index)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  else
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    # Update the direction in place
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    new_params[existing_index][:direction] = target_direction
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                HierarchicalSortService.new(new_params, @sort_service.max_levels)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              # Create a hierarchical sort link with three states
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

              def hierarchical_sort_link(attribute, label = nil, options = {})
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                label ||= attribute.to_s.humanize
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                current_direction = @sort_service.direction_for(attribute)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                priority = @sort_service.priority_for(attribute)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                # Determine CSS classes based on current state
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                css_classes = build_sort_link_classes(current_direction, priority)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                # Generate the URL for toggling this sort
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                toggle_service = @sort_service.toggle_sort(attribute)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                sort_param = toggle_service.to_param
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                # Build the new URL preserving other parameters
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                url_params = request.query_parameters.except('sort')
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                url_params[:sort] = sort_param unless sort_param.empty?
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                link_to players_path(url_params), class: css_classes, data: { turbo_preload: false } do
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  content = ""
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  # Add priority indicator if this sort is active
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  if priority
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    content << tag.span("#{priority}", class: "sort-priority-badge")
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  content << label
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  # Add direction indicator
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  if current_direction != 'inactive'
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    content << " " + tag.span(direction_icon(current_direction, attribute), class: "sort-direction-icon")
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  content.html_safe
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

              
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              # Build CSS classes for sort links based on state and priority
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

              def build_sort_link_classes(direction, priority)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                base_class = "hierarchical-sort-link"
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                case direction
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                when 'inactive'
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  "#{base_class} sort-link-inactive"
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                when 'asc', 'desc', 'random', 'shuffle'
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  classes = "#{base_class} sort-link-active"
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  classes += " sort-link-priority-#{priority}" if priority
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  classes
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                else
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  "#{base_class} sort-link-inactive"
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

              end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

              
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

              # Get appropriate icon for sort direction
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

              def direction_icon(direction, attribute)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                case direction
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                when 'asc'
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  '↑'
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                when 'desc'
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  '↓'
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                when 'random'
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  '🎲'
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                when 'shuffle'
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  '🔀'
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                else
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  ''
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

              
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              # Humanize sort attribute names
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

              def humanize_sort_attribute(attribute)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                case attribute.to_s
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                when 'team_name'
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  'Team'
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                when 'league_name'
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  'League'
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                when 'sport_name'
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  'Sport'
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                when 'position_name'
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  'Position'
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                when 'first_name'
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  'First Name'
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                when 'last_name'
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  'Last Name'
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                else
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  attribute.to_s.humanize
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                end
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

              end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

              
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              # Humanize sort direction
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

              def humanize_sort_direction(direction, attribute)
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                case direction
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                when 'asc'
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  if %w[random shuffle].include?(attribute.to_s)
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                    'active'
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                  else
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    'ascending'
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                  end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                when 'desc'
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                  'descending'
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                when 'random'
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                  'random'
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                when 'shuffle'
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                  'shuffle'
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                else
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  direction.to_s
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                end
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

              end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

            end
          
      277.

    app/helpers/quests_helper.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    31 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 31 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            module QuestsHelper
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Renders a button for an ace to begin a quest
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # If the ace is already on the quest, shows a different button
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def begin_quest_button(quest, options = {})
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                return unless ace_signed_in?

              # Generate a rating slider for a record and selected spectrums
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              # @param record [ActiveRecord::Base] The object being rated (player, team, etc.)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              # @param selected_spectrums [Array<Spectrum>] Collection of currently selected spectrums to display sliders for
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveSupport::SafeBuffer] The HTML for the rating slider
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              def rating_slider_container record, selected_spectrums
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                return unless record.is_ratable?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Determine the record type from the record class
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                record_type = record.class.name.underscore
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53.

                # The outer div simply wraps everything, matches what we see in the teams page

      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # If no spectrums selected, just show a message
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  if selected_spectrums.empty?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    tag.p "Select a spectrum to see rating sliders.",
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                         class: "empty-state-message"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    # The main div with the controller that handles the sliders
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    # This matches the structure in the screenshot exactly
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62.

      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63.

    64.

    66.

      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69.

      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70.

      71.

      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72.

      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74.

              # Build a slider for a specific spectrum
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              # @param record [ActiveRecord::Base] The object being rated
          
      92.

              # @param spectrum [Spectrum] The spectrum to display the slider for
          
      93.

              # @return [ActiveSupport::SafeBuffer] The HTML for a single spectrum slider

              def build_spectrum_slider(record, spectrum)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                record_type = record.class.name.downcase

      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                current_value = record.ratings.active.find_by(spectrum_id: spectrum_id)&.value || 0
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                # The individual slider container

    101. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "rating-slider-instance",
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                        data: { spectrum_id: spectrum_id } do
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  slider_content = ActiveSupport::SafeBuffer.new
          
      105.

      109.

      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                                      class: "slider-label")
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111.

      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                                      class: "slider-value",
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113.

      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    header
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  # Slider (without min/max labels)

      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    slider_row = ActiveSupport::SafeBuffer.new

    127.

      130.

      131.

                    )

              def team_attempts_filter_button team

              def sport_group_team_buttons sport, teams_by_sport

      22.

                    safe_join teams_by_sport[sport].map { |team| team_attempts_filter_button(team) }
          
      23.

                  end
          
      24.

                end
          
      25.

              end
          
      26.

              def team_attempts_filter_panel teams_by_sport, sports

              def review_attempt_card attempt, show_player_name = true
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "attempt-card #{attempt.correct? ? 'correct-attempt' : 'incorrect-attempt'}" do
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "attempt-team-part") do
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    tag.div(class: "attempt-team-logo-container") do
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      display_name_with_lazy_logo attempt.target_entity
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  (show_player_name ? tag.div(class: "attempt-player-part") do
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    tag.div(class: "attempt-player-photo-container") do
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      display_name_with_lazy_logo attempt.subject_entity
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  end : "") +
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  unless attempt.correct?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    tag.div "Your Guess: #{attempt.chosen_entity.name}", class: "chosen-team-indicator"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "attempt-timestamp") do
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    time_ago_in_words(attempt.created_at) + " ago"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57.

      91.

              def result_of_recent_game_attempts_for_player player, attempts_by_player, num_attempts = 5
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                tag.div class: "player-attempts" do
          
      101.

      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  tag.div(class: "attempts-list") do
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    safe_join attempts_by_player[player].sort_by(&:created_at).reverse.take(num_attempts).map { |attempt| review_attempt_card(attempt, false) }
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  end
          
      105.

                end

              end

            end

            module SeasonsHelper

              def season_display_name(season)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                case season.league.sport.name.downcase
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                when 'baseball'
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  # MLB uses single year for season name
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  season.year.number.to_s
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                when 'basketball'
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  # NBA uses hyphenated format like "2023-24"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  "#{season.year.number}-#{(season.year.number + 1).to_s.last(2)}"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                when 'football'
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  # NFL uses single year
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  season.year.number.to_s
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                when 'hockey'
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  # NHL uses hyphenated format like "2023-24"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  "#{season.year.number}-#{(season.year.number + 1).to_s.last(2)}"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                when 'soccer'
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  # MLS uses single year
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  season.year.number.to_s
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                else
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  # Default to single year
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  season.year.number.to_s
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              def season_full_name(season)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                "#{season_display_name(season)} #{season.league.name}"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              def seasons_index_page
          
      30.

                  tag.main(class: "seasons-grid") do

                    @seasons.map { |season| season_item(season) }.join.html_safe

                  end +
          
      37.

                  (pagy_nav(@pagy) if @pagy.pages > 1).to_s.html_safe
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40.

              def season_item(season)

      49.

      54.

                    tag.div(class: "season-meta") do
          
      55.

      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    end +
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    if season.start_date
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      tag.div(class: "season-dates") do
          
      60.

      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                        date_text += " - #{season.end_date.strftime('%b %d, %Y')}" if season.end_date
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                        date_text
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    end.to_s.html_safe
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  end +
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  tag.footer(class: "season-actions") do
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    link_to("View Details", season, class: "btn btn-outline")
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  end
          
      69.

              end

                    if season.season_duration

    110. 
            

            

                        tag.dt("Season Duration") +
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                        tag.dd("#{season.season_duration} days")
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    end.to_s.html_safe

              def season_comments_section(season)

                  tag.ul(class: "comments-list") do

              def season_seed_info_section(season)

                tag.div class: "seed-info-section" do

      176.

                    if season.last_seeded_at
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177.

      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                      end
          
      181.

                    end.to_s.html_safe

              end

            end

    app/helpers/spectrums_helper.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    77 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 77 lines missed.

            module SpectrumsHelper
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # UNUSED
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # Get the current selected spectrum IDs based on params, session, or default to Familiarity.
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # @param params [ActionController::Parameters] The request parameters
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<Integer>] The IDs of the current selected spectrums
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def selected_spectrum_ids
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                ids_from_params = params[:spectrum_ids].is_a?(Array) ? params[:spectrum_ids].map(&:to_i).reject(&:zero?) : []
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                ids_from_session = session[:selected_spectrum_ids].is_a?(Array) ? session[:selected_spectrum_ids].map(&:to_i).reject(&:zero?) : []
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                selected_ids = ids_from_params.presence || ids_from_session.presence
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                if selected_ids.present?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Ensure selected IDs are valid spectrum IDs
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  Spectrum.where(id: selected_ids).pluck(:id)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                else
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # Default to Familiarity spectrum or first available spectrum
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  familiarity = Spectrum.find_by(name: 'Familiarity')
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  default_id = familiarity&.id || Spectrum.first&.id
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  default_id ? [default_id] : []
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              # UNUSED
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              # Set the current selected spectrum IDs in the session.
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              # @param spectrum_ids [Array<Integer>] The IDs to set as current selected spectrums
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              def set_selected_spectrum_ids(spectrum_ids)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                session[:selected_spectrum_ids] = spectrum_ids.map(&:to_i).reject(&:zero?)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              # Get the current selected spectrum objects.
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveRecord::Relation<Spectrum>] The current selected spectrums
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              def selected_spectrums
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                ids = selected_spectrum_ids
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                result = Spectrum.where(id: ids).order(:name)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # If no spectrums are selected, return the first available spectrum for debugging
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                if result.empty? && Spectrum.exists?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "[SpectrumsHelper] No spectrums selected, returning first spectrum"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  Spectrum.limit(1)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                else
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  result
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              # UNUSED
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              # Get a collection of all spectrums for display in the picker.
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              # @param limit [Integer] Maximum number of spectrums to return (currently unused but kept for consistency)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              # @return [ActiveRecord::Relation] Collection of spectrums
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              def default_spectrums(limit = nil)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                spectrums = Spectrum.all.order(:name)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                limit.present? ? spectrums.limit(limit) : spectrums
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              # UNUSED
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              # Generates options for the spectrum select tag.
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              # Displays spectrum name without low/high labels.
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              # Example: "Familiarity" instead of "Familiarity (Low - High)"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<Array<String, Integer>>] An array of [display_name, id] pairs for options_for_select
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              def spectrum_picker_options
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                default_spectrums.map do |spectrum|
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  # Assuming spectrum.name format is "Name (Low Label - High Label)"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  # or just "Name" if no parenthetical part exists.
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  picker_name = spectrum.name.sub(/\s*\(.*\)\s*$/, '').strip
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  [picker_name, spectrum.id]
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              # Renders the floating spectrum picker component
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              def render_floating_spectrum_picker(highlight_color: 'bg-blue-600')
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                content_tag(:div, id: "spectrum-picker", class: "sticky top-4 right-4 z-30 bg-white p-2 rounded-lg shadow-xl border border-gray-200 w-auto max-w-xs", data: { controller: "spectrum-picker", spectrum_picker_highlight_color_value: highlight_color }) do
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  form_with url: url_for, method: :get, local: true, data: { spectrum_picker_target: "form" } do |form|
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    # Collapsed View / Toggle Button
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    collapsed_view = content_tag(:div, class: "flex justify-between items-center cursor-pointer", data: { action: "click->spectrum-picker#toggleExpand" }) do
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      summary_text = selected_spectrums.any? ? selected_spectrums.map { |s| s.name.sub(/\s*\(.*\)\s*$/, '').strip }.join(', ') : "None"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      summary_span = content_tag(:span, summary_text, class: "text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 truncate pr-2", data: { spectrum_picker_target: "summaryDisplay" })
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      toggle_icon_svg = tag.svg(class: "w-5 h-5 text-gray-500 transform transition-transform duration-150", fill: "none", stroke: "currentColor", viewBox: "0 0 24 24", xmlns: "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", data: { spectrum_picker_target: "toggleIcon" }) do
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                        tag.path(stroke_linecap: "round", stroke_linejoin: "round", stroke_width: "2", d: "M19 9l-7 7-7-7")
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      summary_span + toggle_icon_svg
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    # Expandable Content
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    expandable_content = content_tag(:div, class: "hidden mt-3 pt-3 border-t border-gray-200", data: { spectrum_picker_target: "expandableContent" }) do
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      # Multi-select Toggle
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      multi_select_div = content_tag(:div, class: "mb-3") do
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                        label_tag(nil, class: "flex items-center text-sm text-gray-700 cursor-pointer") do
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                          check_box_tag(nil, nil, 
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                                        selected_spectrum_ids.count > 1 || (selected_spectrum_ids.empty? && default_spectrums.count > 1 && default_spectrums.any?),
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                                        class: "form-checkbox h-4 w-4 text-blue-600 border-gray-300 rounded focus:ring-blue-500", 
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                                        data: { spectrum_picker_target: "multiSelectToggle", action: "change->spectrum-picker#handleMultiSelectToggle" }) +
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                          content_tag(:span, "Multiple", class: "ml-2")
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                        end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      # Spectrum Buttons
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      buttons_div = content_tag(:div, class: "flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-3", data: { spectrum_picker_target: "buttonContainer" }) do
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                        # Hidden input to ensure spectrum_ids[] is submitted even if none selected
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                        hidden_input = form.hidden_field :spectrum_ids, value: '', name: 'spectrum_ids[]', id: nil
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                        # Initial inputs for selected spectrums
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                        initial_inputs = selected_spectrum_ids.map { |id| form.hidden_field(:spectrum_ids, value: id, name: 'spectrum_ids[]') }.join.html_safe
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                        buttons = default_spectrums.map do |spectrum|
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                          selected = selected_spectrum_ids.include?(spectrum.id)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                          btn_classes = ["px-2 py-1 rounded cursor-pointer", (selected ? highlight_color : "bg-gray-200 text-gray-700")].join(' ')
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                          button_tag spectrum.name.sub(/\s*\(.*\)\s*$/, '').strip,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                            type: 'button',
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                            class: btn_classes,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                            data: { action: "click->spectrum-picker#toggleSpectrum", spectrum_picker_target: "spectrumButton", spectrum_id: spectrum.id }
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                        end.join.html_safe
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                        hidden_input + initial_inputs + buttons
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      multi_select_div + buttons_div
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    collapsed_view + expandable_content
          
      116.

              def button_classes(type = :primary, size = :medium)

    72. 
            

            

                base = "inline-flex items-center justify-center font-medium rounded-md"
          
      73.

                # Size variations

    75. 
            

            

                size_classes = case size
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                when :small
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  "px-2.5 py-1.5 text-xs"

      80.

      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83.

    86. 
            

            

                when :primary
          
      87.

      89.

              # Generates a link to start a quiz for a given resource
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # @param resource [Object] The resource to generate the quiz link for
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # @param options [Hash] Additional HTML options for the link
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML link to start the quiz
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def quiz_link(resource, options = {})
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                return unless resource.present?
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                resource_type = resource.class.name.underscore
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                default_options = {
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  class: "quiz-button for-#{resource_type}",
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  id: dom_id(resource, :quiz_link_for),
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  data: { turbo: false }
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                # Use a named route for team_match, dynamically setting the query parameter based on resource type
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                link_to 'Quiz Me', strength_team_match_path(:"#{resource_type}_id" => resource.id), 
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                       default_options.merge(options)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20.
