              # Formats a team name for display
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              # @param team [Team] The team to format name for
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              # @return [String] Formatted team name
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              def formatted_team_name(team)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                if team.territory.present? && team.mascot.present?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  "#{team.territory} #{team.mascot}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                elsif team.territory.present?
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  team.territory
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                elsif team.mascot.present?
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  team.mascot
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                else
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  "Unknown Team"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37.

              # Formats a full team location with city and state

              def formatted_team_location(team)

    42. 
            

            

                return "Unknown Location" unless team.stadium&.city

              # Helper for creating auto-submitting select dropdowns
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              # @param form [ActionView::Helpers::FormBuilder] The form builder
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              # @param attribute [Symbol] The attribute to search on
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              # @param collection [Array] Collection of items for the dropdown
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              # @param label_text [String] Label for the field
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              # @param include_blank [Boolean] Whether to include a blank option
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              # @param blank_text [String] Text for the blank option
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for the select dropdown
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              def auto_submit_select(form, attribute, collection, label_text, include_blank: true, blank_text: nil)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                blank_text ||= "-- Select #{label_text} --"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                select_options = include_blank ? [[blank_text, nil]] : []
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                select_options += collection
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                tag.div do
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  form.label(attribute, label_text, class: "form-field-label") +
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  form.select(attribute, 
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                            select_options, 
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                            {}, 
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                            { class: "form-field-input", 
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                              onchange: "this.form.submit();" })
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              # Creates a search form for teams with filters
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              # @param search [Ransack::Search] The Ransack search object

    74. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for the teams search form
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              def team_search_form(search)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # Return an error message if search is nil

                return tag.div("No search object available", class: "search-unavailable") if search.nil?

    78.

                        tag.span("Advanced Filters", class: "mr-2") +

                      adv_content = tag.div(class: "advanced-filters-content hidden", data: { collapse_target: "content" }) do
          
      121.

                        adv_fields = []
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                        
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                        # Only add filters if filter_options are available
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                        if defined?(@filter_options) && @filter_options.present?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                          adv_grid = tag.div(class: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4") do
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                            grid_fields = []
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                            # Sport filter
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                            if @filter_options[:sports].present?
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130.

    131.

      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                            end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                            # League filter
          
      135.

      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                              leagues = @filter_options[:leagues].map { |l| [l.name, l.id] }
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                              grid_fields << auto_submit_select(f, :league_id_eq, leagues, "League")
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                            end  
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                            # Conference filter
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                            if @filter_options[:conferences].present?
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141.

      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                              grid_fields << auto_submit_select(f, :conference_id_eq, conferences, "Conference")
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                            end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                            # Division filter
          
      145.

      146.

      147.

      148.

      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                            end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                            # City filter

      175.

      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              # Generates association links for a given resource based on FilterableAssociations
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              # @param resource [Object] The resource to generate association links for
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

              # @return [String] HTML for the association links
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              def association_links(resource)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                return unless resource.present?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                model_name = resource.class.name.underscore.to_sym
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                associations = FilterableAssociations.from model_name
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                links = associations.map do |assoc|
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  assoc = assoc.to_s.pluralize.to_sym
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  count = resource.send(assoc).count
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  next if count.zero?
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  link_to pluralize(count, assoc.to_s.singularize), [resource, assoc], class: "text-sm text-blue-600 hover:underline"
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                end.compact
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                safe_join links
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

            end
          
      207.

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7.

    app/models/ace.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    32 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 32 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class Ace < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Include default devise modules. Others available are:
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # :confirmable, :lockable, :timeoutable, :trackable and :omniauthable
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              devise :database_authenticatable, :registerable,
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                     :recoverable, :rememberable, :validatable,
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                     :trackable, :confirmable
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                     
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              has_many :goals, dependent: :destroy
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              has_many :active_goals, -> { Goal.active }, class_name: 'Goal'
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              has_many :quests, through: :goals
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              has_many :ratings, dependent: :destroy
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              has_many :game_attempts, dependent: :destroy
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              def adopt_quest(quest)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                goals.find_or_create_by(quest: quest)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              def abandon_quest(quest)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                goals.where(quest: quest).destroy_all
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              # Rating methods
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              # Rate a target on a spectrum with a value
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              # @param target [Object] The target to rate (Player, Team, etc.)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              # @param spectrum [Spectrum] The spectrum to rate on
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              # @param value [Integer] The rating value (-10,000 to 10,000)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              # @param notes [String] Optional notes about the rating
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              # @return [Rating] The created or updated rating
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              def rate(target, spectrum, value, notes = nil)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                rating = ratings.find_or_initialize_by(target: target, spectrum: spectrum)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                rating.value = value
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33.

              def normalized_average_rating_on(spectrum)

            class Contestant < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              belongs_to :contest
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              belongs_to :campaign
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              validates :placing, numericality: { greater_than: 0 }, allow_nil: true
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              validates :wins, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }, allow_nil: true
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              validates :losses, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }, allow_nil: true

    8.

    9. 
            

            

              scope :by_placing, -> { order(:placing) }

    10. 
            

            

              scope :winners, -> { where(placing: 1) }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              scope :runner_ups, -> { where(placing: 2) }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              def winner?

    14. 
            

            

                placing == 1
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15.

            class Highlight < ApplicationRecord

              validates :position, numericality: { only_integer: true, greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }, allow_nil: true

    12. 
            

            

                self.required = true if self.required.nil?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14.

              # Scopes

              scope :optional, -> { where(required: false) }

              def calculate_attempt_stats(attempts, since = 1.week.ago)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                total_attempts = attempts.size
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                correct_attempts = attempts.count &:correct?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                recent_attempts = attempts.where("created_at >= ?", since)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                recent_total = recent_attempts.size
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                recent_correct = recent_attempts.count &:correct?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                {
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  total_attempts: total_attempts,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  correct_attempts: correct_attempts,
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  accuracy: total_attempts > 0 ? (correct_attempts.to_f / total_attempts * 100).round : 0,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  recent_total: recent_total,
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  recent_correct: recent_correct,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  recent_accuracy: recent_total > 0 ? (recent_correct.to_f / recent_total * 100).round : 0
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                }
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            end
          
      100.

              # Get teams associated with this quest's achievements
          
      34.

              def associated_teams

    35. 
            

            

                teams = []

    36. 
            

            

                achievements.each do |achievement|
          
      37.

      38.

    42.

    44. 
            

            

                  when Conference

    45.

      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  # Add other target types if needed
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  end
          
      48.

                end

      51.

            end

            class Rating < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              belongs_to :ace
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              belongs_to :spectrum

    4. 
            

            

              belongs_to :target, polymorphic: true

    5. 
            

            

              
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Validations
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              validates :value, presence: true, 
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8.

      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                                 only_integer: true, 
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                                 greater_than_or_equal_to: -10_000, 
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                                 less_than_or_equal_to: 10_000 
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                               }
          
      13.

              # Scopes

              scope :for_target, ->(target) { where(target: target) }

              scope :positive, -> { where('value > 0') }

    19. 
            

            

              scope :negative, -> { where('value < 0') }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              scope :neutral, -> { where(value: 0) }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              scope :active, -> { where(archived: false) }
          
      23.

              scope :archived, -> { where(archived: true) }
          
      24.

              # Methods

              def positive?
          
      27.

              # Normalized value between 0 and 1 for display purposes

              def normalized_value

    46. 
            

            

              end

    47. 
            

            

            end

    app/models/role.rb

            class Role < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              belongs_to :player
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              belongs_to :position
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              validates :player_id, uniqueness: { scope: :position_id, message: "already has this position" }
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              validates :primary, inclusion: { in: [true, false] }
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              # Ensure only one primary position per player
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              validate :only_one_primary_per_player, if: -> { primary? }
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # Ensure position belongs to the same sport as the player's team
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              validate :position_matches_player_sport
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              private
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              def only_one_primary_per_player
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                if player.roles.where(primary: true).where.not(id: id).exists?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:primary, "position already exists for this player")
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              def position_matches_player_sport
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                return unless player && position
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                unless player.sport == position.sport
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:position, "must belong to the same sport as the player's team")
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end

            end

            class Season < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              belongs_to :year
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              belongs_to :league
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              has_many :campaigns, dependent: :destroy
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              has_many :contests, dependent: :destroy
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              validates :year, presence: true
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              validates :league, presence: true
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              validates :year_id, uniqueness: { scope: :league_id, message: "already has a season for this league" }
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              validates :end_date, comparison: { greater_than: :start_date }, if: -> { start_date.present? && end_date.present? }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              validates :playoff_start_date, comparison: { greater_than_or_equal_to: :end_date }, if: -> { end_date.present? && playoff_start_date.present? }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              validates :playoff_end_date, comparison: { greater_than: :playoff_start_date }, if: -> { playoff_start_date.present? && playoff_end_date.present? }
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> { joins(:year).order("years.number DESC") }

              scope :chronological, -> { joins(:year).order("years.number ASC") }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              scope :seeded, -> { where.not(seed_version: nil) }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              scope :current, -> { where("start_date <= ? AND (end_date IS NULL OR end_date >= ?)", Date.current, Date.current) }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              scope :completed, -> { where("end_date < ?", Date.current) }

    19.

              def season_duration

    29. 
            

            

                return nil unless start_date && end_date

              def playoffs?

    35.

      36.

              def playoffs_duration
          
      38.

                return nil unless playoff_start_date && playoff_end_date

      40.

              end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              def status
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                return "upcoming" if start_date && start_date > Date.current
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                return "in_playoffs" if playoffs? && playoff_start_date <= Date.current && (playoff_end_date.nil? || playoff_end_date >= Date.current)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                return "completed" if end_date && end_date < Date.current
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                "in_progress"
          
      47.

      48.

            end

            class Year < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              has_many :seasons, dependent: :destroy
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              validates :number, presence: true, uniqueness: true
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              validates :number, numericality: { greater_than: 1799, less_than: 3000 }
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> { order(number: :desc) }
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              scope :chronological, -> { order(:number) }

    9. 
            

            

              scope :seeded, -> { where.not(seed_version: nil) }

    app/queries/player_search.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            # PlayerSearch encapsulates complex filtering and sampling logic for players.
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # Pass in a params-like hash (already permitted) and call `#call` to get
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            # an ActiveRecord::Relation or Array (depending on sample) of players.
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            class PlayerSearch
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              DEFAULT_SAMPLE_SIZE = 50
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def initialize(params, scope: Player.all)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @params = params.symbolize_keys
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                @scope  = scope
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              # Returns a sampled set of players based on the filters.
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              # Uses DB-level `ORDER BY RANDOM()` to avoid loading full sets into memory.
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              def call
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                query = @scope
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                query = query.where(team_id: @params[:team_ids])     if @params[:team_ids].present? && @params[:team_id].blank?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                query = query.where(team_id: @params[:team_id])      if @params[:team_id].present?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                query = query.joins(:team).where(teams: { league_id: @params[:league_id] }) if @params[:league_id].present?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                query = query.joins(:team, :league).where(leagues: { sport_id:  @params[:sport_id]  }) if @params[:sport_id].present?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # query = query.where(active: true) unless @params[:include_inactive] == 'true'
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                query.sampled(DEFAULT_SAMPLE_SIZE)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            end
          
      28.
